answers.answer: Yes I am the same one who asked about my hubby but now concerned for myself because he asked me to do a test and our numbers scary similar and my grandfather was diabetic.

question: I have diabetes in my family history and decided to use a family members meter to check and my fasting number in the a.m. is between 85-93. My 2 hour after meals varies between 105-94 but my concern is I dranks 2 big glasses of OJ to see what happens and at 1 hour post it was 173 but at 2 hrs it was at 101. Should I be concerned? Also I recently started estrogen therapy for menopause and take synthroid for my thyroid.This discussion is related to/posts/show/721480.
title: Non diabetic sugar spikes
